Comparison Table (Stacks on Mobile)

✅ Good Practice ❌ Anti-Pattern

Use queries with key conditions

query({ pk: 'USER#123' })

Use scans with filters

scan({ filter: { userId: '123' } })

Code Example (Scrollable on Mobile)

Example Code
import { TableClient } from '@ddb-lib/client';

const client = new TableClient({
  tableName: 'MyTable',
  region: 'us-east-1'
});

const result = await client.get({
  pk: 'USER#123',
  sk: 'PROFILE'
});
